description:
Sanji faces off against his father in a duel! His powerful kicks aim at protecting his hands, but the Germa Family has more in store for him yet! Meanwhile Luffy goes deeper into the Seducing Woods and falls for their powerful illusions!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle Between Father and Son! Judge vs. Sanji!
Un combat entre père et fils. Judge vs. Sanji !
Vater gegen Sohn! – Jajji versus Sanji!
Противостояние отца и сына! Джадж против Санджи!
父子[おやこ]対決 ジャッジVS[たい]サンジ!
